title: How to Bake a Butterball Coffee Cake

steps.headline: Spray a 9-inch round cake pan with nonstick cooking spray.
Melt butter and pour into a shallow bowl.
Combine sugar and cinnamon in a shallow bowl.
Dip biscuits in melted butter then roll the biscuits in the cinnamon-sugar mixture.
Arrange 15 cinnamon-sugar coated biscuits in a circle around the cake pan.
Add the remaining 3 cinnamon-sugar coated biscuits to the center.
Bake the coffee cake until golden, about 25 to 30 minutes.

text: Preheat oven to 375ºF or 190ºC.  Spray a 9-inch round cake pan with nonstick cooking spray.  Melt butter and pour into a shallow bowl.  Combine sugar and cinnamon in a shallow bowl.  Dip biscuits in melted butter then roll the biscuits in the cinnamon-sugar mixture.  Arrange 15 cinnamon-sugar coated biscuits in a circle around the cake pan.  Add the remaining 3 cinnamon-sugar coated biscuits to the center.  Bake the coffee cake until golden, about 25 to 30 minutes.  Serves 9.
